appStore.name: Fantasy AI Ultimate
appStore.subtitle: AI-Powered Fantasy Sports Revolution

description.short: Transform your fantasy sports experience with AI-powered insights, voice commands, and revolutionary 3D lineup visualization.
description.full:
Fantasy AI Ultimate is the most advanced fantasy sports platform ever created, featuring:

üé§ VOICE CONTROL
Just say "Hey Fantasy, optimize my lineup" and watch the magic happen. Our AI assistant understands natural language and helps you make winning decisions.

üß† GPU-POWERED OPTIMIZATION
Our revolutionary lineup optimizer processes millions of combinations in seconds, finding the perfect balance of upside and safety for your contests.

üéÆ 3D LINEUP VISUALIZATION
Watch your players come to life in our stunning 3D stadium view. See real-time scoring animations and correlation patterns between your players.

üìä ADVANCED ANALYTICS
‚Ä¢ Player projections powered by machine learning
‚Ä¢ Ownership projections for tournaments
‚Ä¢ Weather and injury impact analysis
‚Ä¢ Correlation-based stacking recommendations

üèÜ MULTI-PLATFORM SUPPORT
‚Ä¢ Import leagues from Yahoo, ESPN, Sleeper, and more
‚Ä¢ Daily Fantasy Sports optimization for DraftKings and FanDuel
‚Ä¢ Season-long and dynasty league tools
‚Ä¢ Auction draft assistance

üí° SMART FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Tilt detection and bankroll management
‚Ä¢ Emotional support during losing streaks
‚Ä¢ Late swap optimization
‚Ä¢ Push notifications for lineup alerts

üîí SECURE & PRIVATE
Your data is encrypted and never shared. We use bank-level security to protect your information.

Whether you're a casual player or a DFS shark, Fantasy AI Ultimate gives you the edge you need to dominate your leagues.

Subscription Options:
‚Ä¢ Free: Basic features with 5 lineups/week
‚Ä¢ Pro ($9.99/month): Unlimited lineups + advanced analytics
‚Ä¢ Elite ($29.99/month): All features + premium support

Terms of Use: https://fantasyai.app/terms
Privacy Policy: https://fantasyai.app/privacy
